an6.69:1.1: Atha kho annatara devata abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thita kho sa devata bhagavantam etadavoca:
an6.69:1.4: Satthugaravata, dhammagaravata, sanghagaravata, sikkhagaravata, sovacassata, kalyanamittata—
an6.69:1.5: ime kho, bhante, cha dhamma bhikkhuno aparihanaya samvattanti”ti.
an6.69:1.8: Atha kho sa devata “samanunno me sattha”ti bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayi.
an6.69:2.1: Atha kho bhagava tassa rattiya accayena bhikkhu amantesi:
an6.69:2.2: “imam, bhikkhave, rattim annatara devata abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thita kho, bhikkhave, sa devata mam etadavoca:
an6.69:2.5: Satthugaravata, dhammagaravata, sanghagaravata, sikkhagaravata, sovacassata, kalyanamittata—
an6.69:2.6: ime kho, bhante, cha dhamma bhikkhuno aparihanaya samvattanti’ti.
an6.69:2.8: Idam vatva mam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayi”ti.
an6.69:3.1: Evam vutte ayasma sariputto bhagavantam abhivadetva etadavoca:
an6.69:3.2: “imassa kho aham, bhante, bhagavata sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attham ajanami.
an6.69:3.3: Idha, bhante, bhikkhu attana ca satthugaravo hoti satthugaravataya ca vannavadi.
an6.69:3.4: Ye canne bhikkhu na satthugarava te ca satthugaravataya samadapeti.
an6.69:3.5: Ye canne bhikkhu satthugarava tesanca vannam bhanati bhutam taccham kalena.
an6.69:3.11: Ye canne bhikkhu na kalyanamitta te ca kalyanamittataya samadapeti.
an6.69:3.12: Ye canne bhikkhu kalyanamitta tesanca vannam bhanati bhutam taccham kalena.
an6.69:3.13: Imassa kho aham, bhante, bhagavata sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attham ajanami”ti.
an6.69:4.2: Sadhu kho tvam, sariputta, imassa maya sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attham ajanasi.
an6.69:4.3: Idha, sariputta, bhikkhu attana ca satthugaravo hoti satthugaravataya ca vannavadi.
an6.69:4.4: Ye canne bhikkhu na satthugarava te ca satthugaravataya samadapeti.
an6.69:4.5: Ye canne bhikkhu satthugarava tesanca vannam bhanati bhutam taccham kalena.
an6.69:4.11: Ye canne bhikkhu na kalyanamitta te ca kalyanamittataya samadapeti.
an6.69:4.12: Ye canne bhikkhu kalyanamitta tesanca vannam bhanati bhutam taccham kalena.
an6.69:4.13: Imassa kho, sariputta, maya sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attho datthabbo”ti.
